data.author: Dr. Gfeller

changelog.release_notes: This is the lite version with a fixed 15min interval and a static vibe pattern. For random vibe patterns and configurable time intervals, buy the full version of ErgoBooster at https://gum.co/ergobooster or via the "Website Link" in the Pebble App Store listing.

data.description:
ErgoBooster helps you to maintain an ergonomic posture, by gently reminding you with random vibe patterns at random time intervals.

This is the lite version with a fixed 15min interval and a static vibe pattern. For random vibe patterns and configurable time intervals, buy the full version of ErgoBooster at https://gum.co/ergobooster
or via the "Website Link" below.
